meanings.sent1: The store only sells noncola drinks.
meanings.sent2: She prefers noncola sodas over cola ones.
meanings.sent3: At the party, they ran out of cola, so everyone had to drink noncola beverages.
meanings.sent4: His dislike for cola was so strong that he only drank noncola options.
meanings.sent5: The noncola drink tasted refreshing and different from the usual cola flavors.

meanings.definition: Something that is not related to cola.
meanings.sent1: The menu had a variety of noncola options.
meanings.sent2: He decided to try the noncola drink for a change.
meanings.sent3: The noncola snacks were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her interest in noncola products grew as she explored different flavors.
meanings.sent5: The noncola section of the store had unique items not found in the cola aisle.

meanings.definition: A product that is not a cola drink.
meanings.sent1: The company's latest release was a noncola beverage.
meanings.sent2: They introduced a new line of noncola drinks to cater to different tastes.
meanings.sent3: The noncola brand gained popularity among those seeking alternatives to cola.
meanings.sent4: In the taste test, the noncola option stood out for its distinct flavor.
meanings.sent5: The noncola market was expanding as more people sought healthier drink choices.
